nodes.text: The Settlers' Call Fund was a fund set up by Orrin Gault to organize the moisture farmers near Dannar's Claim. It was used to organize moisture farmers against Tusken Raiders. It funded the weapons and vehicles that the Settler's Call group used. Farmers who paid for the cause when the call was alerted made the noise of a krayt dragon. After the Tuskens led by A'Yark launched an attack on Dannar's Claim the fund launched a counterattack and crushed the Tuskens in the Comet Run Day Battle.
